name: Last Hans standing
description:
THE RUSSIAN RATS HAVE DEFEATED OUR TROOPS AND IT IS YOUR TURN TO GIVE YOUR LIFE FOR FATHERLAND HANS, AND DEFEAT THESE COMMIES. 
FÜR DAS MUTTERLAND

As the last remaining soldier in your platoon, it is your obligation to fight till the last breath until the reinforcements arrive, the Reich's future depends on your sacrifice.

The game works by clicking spot you want to move to with RMB and using LMB to shoot.

Last Hans standing is my second game release made by using my own 3D-models and modifying code made originally by youtuber TairaGames in Make a Game with $0 budget.

Any and all feedback is appreciated, negative or positive
